value.name: Suspect arrested in attack on woman pushing baby carriage in Manhattan
value.description: 35 year old Oscar Ruiz was caught Sunday night in Englewood ... He was taken into custody following a tip. Police say he has been linked to the assault from a fingerprint found at the scene.
